name: wood pellet factory production | wood pellet factory | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5866/documentation

This dataset represent the components of wood pellets factory, which produce pellets from wood residue from sawmills (mainly sawdust) and from woodchips. The raw materials is firstly pre-treated and dryed, then comminuted and mixed. In the end it is pellettized, cooled and bagged. This dataset includes all the machineries and devices necessaries for these processes (buildings, dryer, hammermills, hoppers, vibrating screen, conditioner, screw conveyors, cup elevators, several electric motors, pellet presses, horizontal cooler, packaging machine, pallettizer robot, exhaust after treatment devices such as cyclone and electrostatic precipitator, monitors and computer for monitoring). The dataset includes also the tower silos and materials in the external area, necessaries for store and deliver the final product. ;Machineries are assumed to be replaced 1,5 times during the lifetime of the factory (tower silos are replaced only once). All values of exchanges are already adjusted for the factory lifetime. The production capacity of the pellet factory modeled is 50.000.000 kg/year.

From the manufacturing of the infrastructures

This activity ends with the disposal of the pellet factory in the end of its lifetime.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./282:Manufacture of special-purpose machinery/2822:Manufacture of metal-forming machinery and machine tools

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The choice of the machineries and their specific capacity were made basing on an existing Swiss wood pellets production factory. Machineries models are still available on the market (2012).
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: visit at the pellet production factory, answers to a technical questionnaire, verified estimations with materials producers, literature review of machineries and materials
